mapper.sql: id, title, content, state, create_time, update_time, note
mapper.insert: insert into notice (id, title, content, state, create_time, update_time, note) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into notice
id,
title,
content,
state,
create_time,
update_time,
note,

mapper.update:
update notice
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
